title: unesco_heritage_Forts_and_Castles,_Volta,_Greater_Accra,_Central_and_Western_Regions
text:
Name: Forts and Castles, Volta, Greater Accra, Central and Western Regions. short_description:

The remains of fortified trading-posts, erected between 1482 and 1786, can still be seen along the coast of Ghana between Keta and Beyin. They were links in the trade routes established by the Portuguese in many areas of the world during their era of great maritime exploration.

. date_inscribed: 1979. danger: 0. date_end: . longitude: -0.49361. latitude: 5.39103. area_hectares: 0. category_long: Cultural. category_short: C. Country name: Ghana. Region: Africa. iso_code: gh. transboundary: 0. rev_bis: .
